mean_cn: adj. 隐性的，逆行的，后退的
mean_en: causing or relating to a characteristic or condition that a child will have only if both of the child's parents have it
sentence: My sons are dark-haired because my blonde hair comes from a recessive gene.
sentence_trans: 我儿子们头发较黑，因为我的金发遗传自隐性基因。
word_etyma: re回、向后 ＋ cess行走，前进 ＋ ive...的 → recessive隐性的；逆行的
